accessibility_text:
#  Accessibility Statement 

The Bascom’s commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion is reflected in the audiences we serve, the programs we offer, and the access we seek to provide to the community. At The Bascom, we strive toward creating an inclusive environment where the experiences, voices, and creative efforts of all are supported, valued, and celebrated.

#### **Accessibility**

The Bascom: A Center for the Visual Arts aims to provide an inclusive and welcoming environment where individuals with disabilities may participate in the visual arts. Our team seeks to provide access to accommodations to ensure access to programming on The Bascom Campus. Please browse our accommodations and policies below for more information. Can’t find the accommodation you’re looking for? Send a suggestion to the team at [](mailto:info@thebascom.org)This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it..

  * Interior spaces at The Bascom—including galleries, classrooms, retail shop, and Studio Barn—are wheelchair accessible. A wheelchair is available in the Atrium for use.
  * There is accessible parking spaces located between the main entrance and the Studio Barn as well as in the lower-level parking area by the rear entrance.
  * There is elevator access to all levels of the main building.

## Visit: Our Campus

Located on six acres of a former horse farm, The Bascom Campus is a stunningly scenic home for the visual arts in Highlands, NC

[](https://www.thebascom.org/get-to-know-us/our-campus)

## See: Our Exhibitions

Featuring the work of local, regional, national, and international artists that might not otherwise be seen in Western North Carolina

[](https://www.thebascom.org/exhibitions/current-exhibitions)

## Do: Classes & More

The Bascom offers life-enriching, hands-on experiences through comprehensive arts education in a variety of mediums for artists of all ages and skill levels

[](https://www.thebascom.org/education/classes-workshops)

## Play: With Unlimited Potential

Focused on developing 21st Century creative skills, The Bascom encourages young people to come discover their creative selves

[](https://www.thebascom.org/play)

## Gather: In the Name of Art

The Bascom offers a range of special events and opportunities that engage, inform, and inspire our community

[](https://www.thebascom.org/gather/special-events)
